code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 20 year old male presents with mild constriction in eye field, mild trouble seeing in foggy or rainy weather. he has history of mild vision deterioration, especially in the dark. o:Height 69 in, Weight 143 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, and ordered refractive error testing.

s:patient describes recurrent mild trouble seeing in foggy or rainy weather over the past month. The patient reports mild constriction in eye field, mild vision deterioration, especially in the dark. he is a m student aged 21 years. o:Height 69 in, Weight 141 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, and ordered refractive error testing.

content2.Unmatched: patient describes recurrent mild trouble seeing
eye field , mild vision deterioration , especially

td.content: s:white M student aged 21 years with mild pallor, mild easy fatigability and mild fatigue. he has had several such episodes over past 7 months. o:Height 70 in, Weight 146 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, Skin = pallor, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Hemolytic Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed prednisone - 1 mg/kg daily, and ordered CBC, Direct Antiglobulin (Coombs) test.
